title: Pixel 3 XL won't switch to File Transfer / Android Auto when connected to Macbook Pro
content: USB C connecting my Pixel 3XL to 2019 Macbook Pro, and when I go to USB Preferences to switch to File transfer / Android Auto, it automatically and immediately switches back to No data transfer and Android File Transfer sends an error. It works on my desktop PC just fine for FTP.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
